DelayedInputStream - Class in customreading
The DelayedInputStream class represents a custom input stream that can be appended to throughout the lifetime of the program.
DelayedInputStream() - Constructor for class customreading.DelayedInputStream
Constructs a new DelayedInputStream object with an empty buffer and a position of 0 (reading of the buffer starts from that position).
